item.description:
Advanced Spiritual Study Class: The Easy Way Discourse

What Makes these Discourses Special?

The ECK discourses are written with a secret, internal rhythm that gradually unfolds your consciousness in a very precise and orderly manner.

✔ Explore past lives, dreams, and Soul Travel
✔ Find the spiritual lessons behind every experience
✔ Grow and share experiences with like-minded people
✔ Master spiritual tools to make your life run better
✔ Accelerate your spiritual growth

"The Easy Way Discourses are a portal for you to enter the secret worlds that exist beyond our cosmos, the higher regions so well known to the ECK travelers and the saints of old."
- Harold Klemp, spiritual leader of Eckankar
from "Your Road Map to the ECK Teachings"

Experience the miracle of spiritual growth with classes that meet monthly for one year. Open enrollment is for the first three sessions: Anyone interested may attend this class one time as a visitor. If interested in continuing with the class, membership in Eckankar is required. Study the ECK discourses with this class or in the privacy of your own home. Benefits of membership include the study of one discourse each month.  After one year, you are welcome to renew your membership and take the next class in the discourse series.

For more information on membership in Eckankar follow this link:

http://www.eckankar.org/Membership/index.html
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in one of the class rooms in the downstairs Fellowship hall.
